verbs.description: [ARG0: israel] [V: defends] [ARG1: actions against us] [ARGM-LOC: student in detention] an israeli cabinet minister is defending israel handling of the case of an american graduate student who has been held in detention for the past week at israel international airport over suspicions that she promotes a palestinian - led boycott campaign against the jewish state israel alqasem hebrew university ben - gurion airport florida josef federman jared glosser graduate student gilad erdan ben gurion international airport israeli cabinet new york times palestine jerusalem lara alqasem university of florida hillel
